item.title: About Me
item.description: 🐱‍💻 A brief introduction about me. I’m a 17 years old software engineering student and math enthusiast from Venezuela. I’ve worked with Javascript & Typescript in both Deno and Node.js runtimes and I’m currently focused on Rust. I just want to prove Javascript is not stuck to the web browser anymore! Most of my projects are about creating CLI utilies to ship a brand new way to use a useful apps without taking off your hands from the keyword.
